definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The athlete is checked by their physio or doctor.
sentences.chinese: 由专用理疗师或医生为运动员做检查。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pulse-microwave physical therapy produced apparent effects on the treatment of pericoronal infection.
sentences.chinese: 结论脉冲微波理疗对冠周炎有明显的疗效。

sentences.english: How long after surgery did Jenn start therapy, and how was her hand cared for up until that point?
sentences.chinese: 詹尼弗手术后多久开始理疗，此前怎么护理？

sentences.english: The other 20% was still in a physiotherapy room.
sentences.chinese: 而他的另外20%状态，仍然存放在理疗室中。

sentences.english: Objective serching for better therapy of temporomandibular joint syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨治疗颞颌关节综合征的较好的物理疗法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the application of chest physical therapy (CPT) for COPD of convalescence .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸部物理疗法在COPD患者康复期的应用。

sentences.english: Do you remember when it all started for you as a physio?
sentences.chinese: 你还记得你开始作为理疗师的时候吗？

sentences.english: Physical Therapist Assistants This job requires a minimum of an Associate's degree.
sentences.chinese: 理疗助理这类工作的学位最低要求是副学士。

sentences.english: She needed a six-month course of physiotherapy after she broke her leg.
sentences.chinese: 腿骨折后她需要一个六个月的理疗疗程。

sentences.english: Today, my naturopath recommended that I have acupuncture done on both of my legs and back.
sentences.chinese: 今天我的理疗师建议我在腿部和背部做一下针灸治疗。

sentences.english: From the physical point of view, hot bath foot is an immersion therapy.
sentences.chinese: 从理疗学的观点看，热水洗脚是一种浸浴疗法。

sentences.english: Some people even believe they have special healing powers.
sentences.chinese: 一些人甚至相信它们具有一定的特殊理疗功能。

sentences.english: Wendy Birch, 67, a physiotherapist from Birmingham.
sentences.chinese: 67岁，来自伯明翰的一名理疗师。

sentences.english: Conclusions: Brace treatment with supplementary physical therapy is the treatment of choice for patients with compression fractures of the thoracic and lumbar spine.
sentences.chinese: 支具并辅以理疗是胸腰椎压缩性骨折的一种治疗策略。

sentences.english: And without insurance, she could no longer afford physical therapyfor her knee.
sentences.chinese: 而没有保险，她支付不起膝关节理疗的费用。

sentences.english: Massage is one of the external treatment of Chinese medicine, is a physical therapy.
sentences.chinese: 按摩是中医的外治法之一，属物理疗法。

definition: wax therapy (used to treat arthritis etc)
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)
diathermia (medical treatment involving local heating of body tissues with electric current)
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
